name: Ojama Blurple
text: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Ojama" card from your Deck to the GY; add 1 "Ojama Fusion" from your Deck to your hand.
pendulum_text: When you Pendulum Summon, you can also summon "Ojama" monsters from your GY. Once per turn, you can tribute 1 "Ojama" monster you control; Special Summon an "Ojama" monster with a different name from your hand, Deck, or GY.
